summary: Space captain Harlock, the latest in a family of proud aerial warriors, begins his journey to free the oppressed Earth from the despotic Illumidas Command.
cast: Makio Inoue|Kei Tomiyama|Yûjirô Ishihara|Shûichi Ikeda|Tarô Ishida|Eiko Masuyama|Didi Moore|Shûichirô Moriyama|Reiko Mutô|Hidekatsu Shibata|Reiko Tajima|Hiromi Tsuru|Kôji Yada|Yuriko Yamamoto|Takeshi Aono|Hiroshi Ôtake|Hideyuki Tanaka|Kaneto Shiozawa|Masaharu Satô|Ai Sakuma|Rinko Okamoto|Seiko Nakano|Mugihito|Satomi Majima|Eiji Kanie|Lanny Broyles|Walter Carroll|Cliff Harrington|Michelle Hart|Jeff Manning|Richard Nieskens|William Ross|Carrie Sakai|Justine Simons|Gerri Sorrells|Hitoshi Takagi|Mike Worman
title: El Capitán Harlock en Arcadia
